tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_log (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    username TEXT,
    ip_address INET,
    query_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE auditing_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR(255),
  activity_date TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_threats (
  threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_type VARCHAR(255),
  threat_level INT,
  description TEXT,
  detected_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_type VARCHAR(255),
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    activity VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_access_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    ip_address VARCHAR(50),
    action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE threat_detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_log (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  activity TEXT,
  ip_address TEXT);

CREATE TABLE user_activity_log (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  ip_address TEXT);

CREATE TABLE query_log (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  query_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  ip_address TEXT);

CREATE TABLE login_attempts (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  success BOOLEAN,
  ip_address TEXT);

CREATE TABLE access_log (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  resource TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action TEXT);
